column5: Ontario's fish sanctuaries are scheduled to open on June 15th. Will the openings be pushed back with the late spawn? I know last year with the early ice out they held tight to the 15th.
Big brother is not that flexible or responsive....sanctuaries will open as scheduled. They will be vulnerable. Practice C & R and enjoy.
They will be open on the 15th. Fisherman 1792
Some are open on June 1 in NWO.
